alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 6:43PM CST until January 28 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowleech Fork Sabine River at Greenville. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Caution should be exercised near the river as water begins to flow out of the banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 15.7 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
